name: h3
description: The 2025 DeMarini CF Drop 10 Fastpitch Softball Bat is designed for players seeking a balanced swing feel with maximum performance. Certified by USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC, this bat ensures compliance across various leagues. Its standout features include a two-piece composite construction and a 2 1/4 inch barrel diameter, offering a massive sweet spot and exceptional responsiveness thanks to the Paraflex Plus Composite. The Type V Connection Point effectively reduces hand vibration while transferring energy efficiently to the barrel, and the Tracer End Cap enhances bat speed. Sporting a vibrant white, purple, and yellow colorway, the CF series combines style with cutting-edge technology. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
